Class BoardArray1D

java.lang.Object
AbstractBoard
BoardArray1D
public class BoardArray1D
extends AbstractBoard
The BoardArray1D extends from AbstractBoard class. The Board is represented using a one dimensional Java array.

  • Field Summary

  • Method Details

    • cell

      public int cell​(int index1, int index2)
      Takes two indexes and returns the corresponding cell content. Since, this is 1D dynamic array return context of cell that corresponding to 2D array by using math. Terminates program if the indexes are not valid.
      Specified by:
      cell in class AbstractBoard

    • cell

      protected void cell​(int index1, int index2, int newValue)
      Takes two indexes and a new value. Change corresponding cell content with new value. Since, this is 1D dynamic array change context of cell that corresponding to 2D array by using math. Terminates program if the indexes are not valid.
      Specified by:
      cell in class AbstractBoard

    • setSize

      public void setSize​(int r, int c, int s)
      Create a java array with given size and reset with solution.
      Specified by:
      setSize in class AbstractBoard
      Parameters:
      r - row value
      c - column value
      s - size value
